content:
I'd be happy to help you with that. Here's a organized grocery list by aisle/category:

**Produce:**

* Bell peppers (2-3)
* Onions (2)
* Mushrooms (1 pint)
* Tomatoes (1 pint cherry tomatoes or 2-3 medium tomatoes)
* Avocado (2-3)
* Spinach (1 bag)
* Carrots (1 bunch)
* Brussels sprouts (1 bunch)
* Sweet potatoes (2-3)
* Fresh cilantro (1 bunch)
* Fresh basil (1 bunch)
* Thyme (1 sprig or 1 packet of dried thyme)

**Meat/Seafood:**

* Ground beef (1 lb) or vegetarian alternative (e.g., tofu, tempeh)
* Chicken breast (1-2 lbs)

**Dairy/Eggs:**

* Heavy cream (1 cup)
* Mozzarella cheese (shredded, 1 cup)
* Shredded cheese (1 cup)
* Sour cream (1 cup)

**Canned Goods:**

* Canned black beans (1 can)
* Canned diced tomatoes (1 can)
* Enchilada sauce (1 can)

**Pantry:**

* Olive oil
* Garlic
* Tomato paste
* Fajita seasoning
* Balsamic vinegar
* Honey
* Salt
* Pepper

**Bakery:**

* Crusty bread (1 loaf)

**Miscellaneous:**

* Tortillas (6-8)
* Salsa (1 jar)

Feel free to adjust the quantities based on your personal preferences and the number of people you're planning to cook for. You may already have some pantry staples like olive oil, garlic, and spices, so be sure to check your kitchen before you head out to shop!

If you're using Instacart, you can simply add these items to your cart and adjust the quantities as needed. Happy shopping and cooking!
